data.message: I would have liked this to have appeared much earlier in my newsfeed. I didn't know about this option. Also I have no idea how or where the camera is located. On my wall, newsfeed , newpost .......?

replies.message: Hi Claudia. The Facebook Camera is a new in-app camera/capture experience that is packed with masks, frames, and style effects that you can apply to photos and videos. We recently launched Stories and Direct as part of the system experience. From your News Feed, just swipe right to get started using Camera. -Jessica
